setting.description: List of things supporters must agree to when signing up
setting.name: signup_agreement

value.default:
By submitting this form you agree to these terms:

  • You are the named representative of the institution named above.
  • You are authorised to commit to expenditure of the institution named above.
  • We have the right to reject funds from any organization or individual for any reason.

setting.description: Text thanking users on completion of the sign-up form
setting.name: complete_text

value.default: Thank you for signing up. You should receive a confirmation email soon. We will then be in touch to confirm billing details.

value.default: We work with {{ supporter.billing_agent }} to handle billing for supporters in your band. Please follow the link to their website to complete the signup process.

setting.description: General email for recommending the OLH
setting.name: recommend_us_general_email

value.default:
Dear Librarian,

I am writing to ask if the library would be able to join the Open Library of Humanities please? I am very impressed with their excellent cause as a diamond open-access publisher (see https://www.openlibhums.org/site/become-a-supporter/ ).

Many thanks.

setting.description: Author email for recommending the OLH
setting.name: recommend_us_author_email

value.default:
Dear Librarian,

I am writing to ask if the library would be able to join the Open Library of Humanities please? I recently published my paper ‘{{ article.title|safe }}’ ( {% if article.doi %}{{ article.doi }}{% else %}{{ article.url }}{% endif %} ) in {{ article.journal.name }} with the Open Library of Humanities. I was very impressed with their publication process and excellent cause as a diamond open-access publisher (see https://www.openlibhums.org/site/become-a-supporter/ ).

Many thanks.
